articles.title: Azor review - eerie conspiracy thriller about the complacency of the super-rich
articles.description: Andreas Fontana’s debut feature is an unnervingly subtle drama about a Swiss private banker visiting clients in Argentina during the period of the military junta and ‘disappearances’
articles.content: Pure evil is all around in this unnervingly subtle, sophisticated movie; an eerie oppression in the air. Andreas Fontana is a Swiss director making his feature debut with this conspiracy drama-thriller, shot with a kind of desiccated blankness, about... [4071 chars]

articles.title: UPDATE 2-Argentina's Fernandez wants IMF deal 'as soon as conditions allow'
articles.description: Argentina wants to tie up a new deal with the International Monetary Fund (IMF) as soon as conditions allow, President Alberto Fernandez said on Wednesday, downplaying reports he had ruled out a potential agreement this year.

articles.description: Aston Villa goalkeeper Emiliano Martinez has been called 'one of the best in the world' by Argentina teammate Lionel Messi
articles.content:
Lionel Messi has made it his personal mission to raise the profile of Aston Villa goalkeeper Emiliano Martinez.

articles.title: UPDATE 1-Argentina says corn exports 'open' despite policy row with farmers
articles.description: Argentina's corn export market remains "open" despite a new government policy that prioritizes crops that are already harvested over forward sales of the upcoming crop, the agriculture ministry said on Tuesday.
